title: Preternatural
description: “…you will be destined to die.”That was the phrase that finished me. There’s no going back to a place after a creature from hell attacks you there. It’d be a nightmare - especially if you’re my age.Of all days in my life, I had to find out I was an alien with bizarre powers midway through school’s first term. I wasn't warned; it just happened. And here I was thinking I’d be taken to Neverland to live like Peter Pan.Wrong!My name is Aden and I’m a boy who must die by any means necessary. You’d think I’d escape this fate - having a bunch of gifted people protecting me.Well…they can’t succeed in doing that when a boy that looks identical to me, dressed in black follows me everywhere.You see, my death is marked by my very own Grim Reaper.
author: Lloyd Harry-Davis
